ygData.subject: Re: Yet another possible cheat
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, any eye will drop them, many people say that the Lords have a higher drop rate, however this is untrue based on my exp... In fact ive obtained more PBB s
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, any eye will drop them, many people say that the Lords have a higher drop rate, however this is untrue based on my exp... In fact ive obtained more PBB's off regulare evil eyes then lords. And btw, that is quite rare... Ive soloed the EE's in the gorge for 30 hr periods... and gotten two or three PBB's in one session... Once i even got 3 in a row off the same spawn... If you were fighting with a party when you kept track of these '80 kills' perhapes you should consider the possibility that your party members werent all honest about there loots smile, if not... then you just have bad luck :( And a side note: Evil eyes also drop polished bone hoops for those who dont know... of course not as good as PBB's but they are a fair item for a lvl 17 and up, untill you get something better... plus 10 mana each, i know it doesnt seem like much and with the twinking standards now days you could probably get much better, but in the long run with two, it isnt bad... sorry for the long post-

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Harrell jharrell+AEA-planetalumni.com
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 5:07 PM
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Yet another possible cheat


From: +ACI-Jason Harrell+ACI- jharrell+AEA-planetalumni.com

It's a random drop from any evil eye, as far as I'm aware. I got one from
East Karana, and one in the gorge. FYI, I actually kept track of the total
and I had to kill over 80 eyes to get a pair of the PBB's. I'm told this is
extraordinarily bad luck...

-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David +AFs-mailto:DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com+AF0-
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 3:46 PM
To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com'
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Yet another possible cheat


From: +ACI-Whitcraft,David+ACI- DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com

About this, is the PBB on one specific eye or is it on any eye in the area
(gorge/EK)?

-Leod

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Harrell +AFs-mailto:jharrell+AEA-planetalumni.com+AF0-
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 3:42 PM
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Subject: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Yet another possible cheat


From: +ACI-Jason Harrell+ACI- jharrell+AEA-planetalumni.com

Although many of you may know this:
/spoilerbufferon
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
When fighting evil eyes in the gorge the other night, I hit the sit button
while charmed somehow. The result was canceling the charm, which allowed me
to continue with my battle. I managed to do this repeatedly throughout the
night. This could be a coincidence or an actual bug in the game, I'm not
sure. Since I felt it was cheating, I quit doing it and left the gorge+ADs-
after all, I only wanted another Polished Bone Bracer +ADs-)

Good Hunting All.
